originalTitle: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
title: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
content: The UN mission says it is gravely concerned by "inflammatory rhetoric calling for violence against civilians".

originalTitle: Uganda's military chief denies army assaulted Bobi Wine's wife
title: Uganda's military chief denies army assaulted Bobi Wine's wife
content: Barbara Kyagulanyi, married to the opposition leader, says she refused to reveal her husband's whereabouts.

originalTitle: People cling to treetops as 'worst floods in a generation' sweep Mozambique
title: People cling to treetops as 'worst floods in a generation' sweep Mozambique
content: The worst flooding in a generation hits Mozambique with teams from Brazil, South Africa and the UK helping with the rescue.

originalTitle: EU launches probe into Grok AI feature creating deepfakes of women, minors
title: EU launches probe into Grok AI feature creating deepfakes of women, minors
content: European Commission says its investigation will examine if the AI tool has met its legal obligations.

originalTitle: Netanyahu says next phase of ceasefire is ‘demilitarising’ Gaza
title: Netanyahu says next phase of ceasefire is ‘demilitarising’ Gaza
content: Benjamin Netanyahu said the next phase of the ceasefire will be “disarming Hamas and demilitarising the Gaza Strip.”

originalTitle: As US ‘armada’ approaches, Iran warns of dire consequences if attacked
title: As US ‘armada’ approaches, Iran warns of dire consequences if attacked
content: Iranian authorities are keeping the population offline for a third week amid lingering threats of another war.

originalTitle: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gvili’s return "an extraordinary achievement".

originalTitle: 'This is horrifying' - Minneapolis residents reel from second deadly shooting
title: 'This is horrifying' - Minneapolis residents reel from second deadly shooting
content: Two people have been shot dead by federal agents in the city in recent weeks, leaving many angry and frustrated.

originalTitle: France debates under-15s social media ban endorsed by Macron
title: France debates under-15s social media ban endorsed by Macron
content: Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu has said he will use a fast-track procedure to get the legislation on the books by September.

originalTitle: One week until transfer deadline day - who could be on the move?
title: One week until transfer deadline day - who could be on the move?
content: BBC Sport looks at some of the players that have been linked with moves before the Premier League transfer deadline on 2 February at 19:00 GMT.

originalTitle: Besiktas pay £11m for Abraham - to sell him to Villa
title: Besiktas pay £11m for Abraham - to sell him to Villa
content: Besiktas pay £11.2m to Roma for Tammy Abraham - as the Turkish club prepare to sell him to Aston Villa.

originalTitle: Yorath remembered at funeral as 'funny, humble man'
title: Yorath remembered at funeral as 'funny, humble man'
content: Around 100 mourners attended the funeral of the Wales and Leeds midfielder, who died aged 75.
